Header.title: Network Traffic Dashboard
Header.paragraph: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Duis sed dapibus leo nec ornare diam sed commodo nibh ante facilisis bibendum.

About.paragraph: How might security analysts specializing in security aspects of applications utilize AI & ML models on network traffic data so that they can improve the security and privacy of web-based service enterprises? Here at iBDawgs, we explore and develop AI and ML models to detect and analyze different account behaviors by looking at patterns of logins across features/entities shared by attackers.
Why: Current methods may not prevent unauthorized access
Vulnerability lead to losses and damages
Traditional methods may not suffice against evolving threats
Why2: Audience: security analysts specialized in app security
Secure web services with open-source data
Reduce risks, enhance digital ecosystem security

Testimonials.text: "Using the interactive data visualization dashboard was a delightful experience for me as it enabled me to delve into the network security data and uncover valuable insights regarding how various features can aid in detecting potential threats."
Testimonials.name: Computer Science Undergraduate Student (20)

Testimonials.text: "For individuals seeking to expand their knowledge of cybersecurity trends and data, the website serves as an exceptional resource."
Testimonials.name: Cybersecurity Intern (22)

Testimonials.text: "iBDawgs Dashboard website is an excellent tool that facilitates the exploration of cybersecurity trends and provides valuable industry insights."
